p: The relationship between smaller proportions of 10:0, 12:0, and 14:0 fatty acids and dietary supplementation with unsaturated oils has been reported by other authors [ 32]. The inclusion of lipid sources rich in long chain UFA in the diet of dairy cows is often characterized by inhibition of the de novo synthesis of short and medium chain fatty acids (SMCFAs) in the mammary glands [ 6].
